About TJS2

TJS2 is an object-oriented scripting language developed for the purpose of being embedded into applications. It also possesses characteristics of non-object-oriented languages, allowing developers to write in a way that is easy for them.
The syntax is similar to JavaScriptTM and JavaTM, making it easy to learn.

About this Manual

This manual explains TJS2 from a syntax perspective.
It also provides explanations for the classes and methods pre-defined in TJS2.
